services.name: 3 Phase Hand Wash
services.description: A thorough three-step cleaning process that removes dirt, grime, and light contaminants from the vehicle's exterior.

services.name: Wheel and Tire Hand Wash
services.description: Removes brake dust, road grime, and restores the shine of wheels and tires (no removal).

services.name: Hydrophobic Coating
services.description: Applies a water-repellent coating to exterior surfaces to protect against water, dirt, and contaminants.

services.name: Glass Cleaning Inside and Out
services.description: Clean all windows and mirrors inside and out with specialized glass cleaners for a streak-free finish.

services.name: Delicate Air Dry
services.description: Gently dries the vehicle's exterior using filtered dry air to prevent water spots.

services.name: Control Panel Cleaning
services.description: Cleans buttons, knobs, and screen areas using compressed air and gentle detailing tools to remove dust safely.

services.name: Door Jamb Cleaning
services.description: Detailed cleaning of the inner door frames to remove dirt buildup and enhance appearance.

services.name: Door Panel Cleaning
services.description: Cleans door panels using a Tornador to remove dust and buildup from textured surfaces and crevices.

services.name: Deep Mat Shampoo
services.description: Deep cleans fabric floor mats using an extractor to remove stains, odors, and embedded dirt.

services.name: Tornador Vacuuming
services.description: Vacuums carpets, seats, and the trunk, using a Tornador to remove dirt and debris.

services.name: 4 Phase Hand Wash
services.description: An enhanced wash that includes four cleaning stages for a deeper, more comprehensive exterior cleanse.

services.name: Iron Decontamination
services.description: Dissolves embedded iron particles from brake dust on paint and wheels using a specialized solution — removing them prevents long-term paint damage.

services.name: Tar Removal
services.description: Safely eliminates stubborn tar spots from the vehicle's body.

services.name: Calcium Spot Removal
services.description: Removes stubborn calcium and mineral deposits from glass surfaces to restore clarity and improve visibility.

services.name: Dashboard and Interior Trim Cleaning
services.description: Gently removes dust and buildup from the dashboard and interior trim, leaving surfaces clean and refreshed.

services.name: Wheel and Tire Wax Treatment
services.description: Adds a protective wax layer to wheels and tires for longer-lasting shine and durability.

services.name: Exhaust Tip Cleaning
services.description: Removes soot and buildup from exhaust tips for a polished look.

services.name: Control Panel Deep Shampoo
services.description: Deep clean buttons and surfaces in the center console and dashboard area.

services.name: Steering Wheel Deep Clean and Protection
services.description: Sanitize and protect the steering wheel with specialized cleaning products.

services.name: Interior Plastic Conditioning
services.description: Applies protectant to plastic interior components to restore shine and prevent fading.

services.name: Seat Shampoo
services.description: Deep clean cloth seats to remove stains, odors, and dirt.

services.name: Seat Conditioning
services.description: Nourish and protect leather or cloth seats and surfaces to maintain softness and prevent cracking.

services.name: Trunk Shampoo
services.description: Deep clean trunk carpeting to remove stains, odors, and debris using specialized shampoo.

services.name: Antibacterial Ozonization
services.description: Uses ozone treatment to disinfect the vehicle's interior and eliminate embedded odors from seats, carpets, and airspace.

services.name: Headlight Polishing
services.description: Restores clarity and brightness to foggy or yellowed headlights.

services.name: Wheel Arch and Suspension Wash
services.description: By removing the wheels, cleans hard-to-reach areas around the wheel arches and suspension components.

services.name: Clay Bar Treatment
services.description: Removes embedded contaminants from paint for a smooth, glass-like exterior surface.

services.name: Door Panel Deep Shampoo
services.description: Cleans door panels using a Tornador and shampoo to remove dust, grime, and buildup from textured surfaces and crevices.

services.name: Seat Shampoo with Removal
services.description: Remove and shampoo cloth seats for an ultra-deep clean and complete odor removal.

services.name: Carpet Shampoo
services.description: Deep cleans carpets to eliminate embedded dirt and refresh fibers.

services.name: Glove Box Shampoo
services.description: Clean and sanitize the inside and outside of the glove compartment.

services.name: AC Disinfection and Ozonization
services.description: Combines ozone treatment with AC system disinfection to eliminate odors and bacteria from both the cabin and ventilation system.

services.name: Hard Wax
services.description: Apply a durable layer of wax by hand to protect the paint and make your vehicle shine. Hard wax lasts longer than liquid wax

services.name: Rain-Repellent Treatment on Windshield
services.description: A hydrophobic layer to the windshield for improved visibility during rain.

services.name: UV Protection for Exterior Plastic
services.description: Apply a UV-resistant treatment to prevent fading and cracking of exterior plastic trims.

services.name: Engine Bay Cleaning
services.description: Safely clean the engine compartment to remove dust, oil, and grease buildup.

services.name: Dust and Oil Repellent for Underhood Plastics
services.description: Applies a specialized coating to underhood plastic components that prevents dust and oil from sticking.

services.name: Ceramic Coating 3 Layers
services.description: Offers triple-layer ceramic protection for maximum gloss and resistance to environmental damage.

services.name: 3-Step Paint Polishing
services.description: Three-step polishing enhances your car's appearance with a deep, eye-catching shine. We carefully inspect the paint beforehand and use the least aggressive method possible to remove defects while preserving the clear coat.

services.name: Rain-Repellent Treatment on All Glass
services.description: A hydrophobic layer to all glass for improved visibility during rain.

services.name: Seat Belt Shampoo
services.description: Deep clean seat belts to remove stains, odors, and grime.

services.name: 3-in-1 Paint Polishing
services.description: Paint correction to remove swirls, scratches, and restore paint clarity.

services.name: Odor Removal with Dry Fog
services.description: Eliminate persistent odors using a dry fog treatment that penetrates fabric and vents.

services.name: Professional Photo Shoot for Sale
services.description: High-quality photography service to showcase your car for online listings or resale.

services.name: Sleeping Area Deep Clean
services.description: Performs a thorough extraction-based cleaning of mattresses and bedding areas to remove stains, odors, and allergens.

services.name: Cabinet and Shelf Cleaning
services.description: Wipes down and sanitizes all interior cabinets and shelves to remove dust, spills, and buildup for a fresh, tidy space.

services.name: Appliance Cleaning
services.description: Cleans and sanitizes interior appliances such as fridges, microwaves, and stovetops to remove grease, crumbs, and odors.

services.name: Control Panel Plastic Conditioning
services.description: Applies protectant to plastic control panel components to restore shine and prevent fading.

services.name: Curtain Cleaning
services.description: Deep cleans curtains to remove dust, stains, and odors, leaving them fresh and revitalized.

services.name: 2 Phase Hand Wash
services.description: Special hand wash for vehicles with wax or ceramic coatings.

services.name: Motorcycle Wash
services.description: Includes a hand wash with shampoo, iron decontamination, tar removal, exhaust pipe cleaning, wheel and tire cleaning.

services.name: Ceiling Deep Shampoo
services.description: Involves thorough vacuuming to remove dust, followed by gentle cleaning with the right shampoo and soft brush—tailored to each vehicle using appropriate methods and chemicals.

services.name: Child Seat Shampoo
services.description: Cleans cloth parts with an extractor and steam, plastic parts with a soft brush and shampoo.

services.name: Interior Trim Polishing
services.description: Spot polish of all interior decorative trim to restore shine and remove minor scratches.

services.name: Headlight Restoration
services.description: Restores headlight looks and clarity through sanding and applying a protective clear coat.

services.name: Tail Light Polishing
services.description: Restores clarity and appearance of foggy or yellowed tail lights.

services.name: Windshield Restoration
services.description: Removes scratches from a windshield by sanding and polishing. Makes the windshield look new again.

services.name: Ceramic Coating 1 Layer
services.description: Applies ceramic protection for gloss and resistance to environmental damage.

services.name: Ceramic Coating 2 Layers
services.description: Offers double-layer ceramic protection for maximum gloss and resistance to environmental damage.

services.name: Liquid Wax
services.description: Apply a layer of liquid wax to protect the paint and make your the vehicle shine.
